TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, (c + 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- PythonCalc(select=[c, pyFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
